item.title: Trump administration formally accepts gift jet from Qatar
item.description: Qatar's gift to the Trump administration has drawn accusations of bribery from Democrats and warnings about cost and timeline from aviation experts.

item.title: Trump urged to make Musk, DOGE workers certify they won't use government data for personal benefit
item.description: A number of special government employees for DOGE — led by Elon Musk — have worked for the Tesla CEO's companies, which are regulated by the governmen...

item.title: Trump tax bill faces fresh hurdles as holdouts meet with Trump at White House
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson must unify his conference's hard-line conservatives and its moderate Republicans from blue states.

item.title: Democratic Rep. Gerry Connolly of Virginia dies after battling cancer
item.description: Members of Congress paused their battle over President Donald Trump's massive tax bill to hold a moment of silence in Connolly's honor.

item.title: Noem says Trump can deport who he wants, botches what 'habeas corpus' means
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem spoke after White House aide Stephen Miller floated suspending the writ of habeas corpus for migrants.
